results.title: Role of Drug-Gene Interactions and Pharmacogenetics in Simvastatin-Associated Pulmonary Toxicity
results.text_hl: This is also considered the most important metabolic pathway for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. More than two-thirds of the cases (70%) used one or more drugs that may cause @<m>DISEASE_Acidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@, which in turn may enhance the formation of the more toxic @CHEMICAL_Lactones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007783 @@@lactone@@@ form of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Jessurun NT, Drent M, Wijnen PA, Harmsze AM, van Puijenbroek EP, Bekers O, Bast A. Role of Drug-Gene Interactions and Pharmacogenetics in Simvastatin-Associated Pulmonary Toxicity Drug Saf. 2021 Nov;44(11):1179-1191. PMID: 34606062

results.title: [Skin manifestation of mixed hyperlipidaemia in the course of decompensated diabetes].
results.text_hl: During the treatment the infusion liquids, @CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@, metronidasol, amoxiclav, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were administered.

citations.NLM: Gajer GK, Krawczyk AK, Petrulewicz-Salamon IT. [Skin manifestation of mixed hyperlipidaemia in the course of decompensated diabetes]. Wiad Lek. 2006;59(3-4):265-8. PMID: 16813277
